channel.title: Open Ears is Unable to listen if music is turned on in the application. – Politepix

item.title: Open Ears is Unable to listen if music is turned on in the application.
item.dc:creator: ravoorivaran
item.description:
Hi,
Am so impressed by the way the open ears is working and the integration part has been made so easy than before.
Currently am working on a iOS application which has music and navigation modules in it.
When music is turned on and immediately turned off, and then i make PocketSphinx to listen, but it is unable to recognise the speech because of this(even though AVaudiosession is paused).
Please let me know what i have to do to make it work in this kind of scenarios.

item.title: Reply To: Open Ears is Unable to listen if music is turned on in the application.
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

Sure, please check out the post Please read before you post â€“ how to troubleshoot and provide logging info here so you can see how to turn on and share the logging that provides troubleshooting information for this kind of issue.
